front.title: Dynamic Service Negotiation: The Connectivity Provisioning Negotiation Protocol (CPNP)
front.abstract: This document defines the Connectivity Provisioning Negotiation Protocol (CPNP), which is designed to facilitate the dynamic negotiation of service parameters. CPNP is a generic protocol that can be used for various negotiation purposes that include (but are not necessarily limited to) connectivity provisioning services, storage facilities, Content Delivery Networks, etc.
